name: CANNON
description:
CANNON is a minimalist puzzle game about cannons, balls and cubes.

Activate the cannons in the right order to destroy all cubes.

Difficulty increases with several other mechanics.

* 50 progressive levels
* 50 Steam Achievements
* Original music and effects
* Minimalist and intuitive mechanics, use only the mouse button
* No time, no timer and no pressure, solve the puzzles in your time
